summary.span: 为所有 元素提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for all elements.

summary.span: 使用 元素放置和排列 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 应用程序中的子对象。

span.span: Use elements to position and arrange child objects in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个包含一系列对象，后者是在属性。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 添加子级隐式地将其添加到为元素。Adding a child to a implicitly adds it to the for the element. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 提供了一套全面的派生实现中，启用许多复杂的布局。provides a comprehensive suite of derived implementations, enabling many complex layouts. 如果你想要实现新的布局容器，使用和方法。If you want to implement new layout containers, use the and methods. 有关如何使用这些方法的演示，请参阅[创建自定义内容换行面板示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979)。For a demonstration of how to use these methods, see [Create a Custom Content-Wrapping Panel Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979). 如果元素不接收鼠标或触笔事件未定义。 elements do not receive mouse or stylus events if a is not defined. 如果需要处理鼠标或触笔事件，但不是希望为你，使用。If you need to handle mouse or stylus events but do not want a background for your , use . Panel 元素默认情况下不接收焦点。Panel elements do not receive focus by default. 若要强制面板元素接收焦点，设置属性设置为`true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来添加两个对象添加到。The following example shows how to use the property to add two objects to a . [!code-xaml[StackPanel_snip#StackPanelExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StackPanel_snip/CS/StackPanelExample.xaml#stackpanelexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[Stackpanel_Procedural_snip#StackPanelExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Stackpanel_Procedural_snip/CSharp/StackpanelExample.cs#stackpanelexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[Stackpanel_Procedural_snip#StackPanelExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Stackpanel_Procedural_snip/visualbasic/stackpanelexample.vb#stackpanelexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能将数据绑定到此属性。You cannot bind data to this property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例使用来创建水平。The following example uses a to create a horizontal . 水平内指定。The horizontal is specified within the . 属性设置为`true`上，指示应将生成的项放在面板中。The property is set to `true` on the , which indicates that the generated items should be placed in the panel. 当这种方式，指定不能替换为控件的用户，而无需使用。When you specify it this way, the cannot be replaced by the user of the control without using a . 因此，执行此操作仅在知道您不希望替换而不使用模板的面板。Therefore, do this only if you know that you do not want the panel to be replaced without the use of a template. [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSnippet#ListBoxCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#listboxct)] 或者，可以设置属性。Alternatively, you can set the property. 下面的示例设置中的。The following example sets the in a of a . summary.span: 设置给定元素的 附加属性的值。

span.span: Sets the value of the attached property for a given element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更高版本`value`的给定`element`，越有可能`element`将在前台显示。The greater the `value` of a given `element`, the more likely the `element` is to appear in the foreground. 同样，如果`element`具有相对较低`value`，则`element`可能会在后台中。Likewise, if an `element` has a relatively low `value`, the `element` will likely appear in the background. 例如， `element` ，其`value`上方将显示为 5`element`具有`value`4，又将出现在上面的`element`值为 3，依此类推。For example, an `element` that has a `value` of 5 will appear above an `element` that has a `value` of 4, which in turn will appear above an `element` that has a value of 3, and so on. 允许使用负值，并将不断此优先顺序模式。Negative values are allowed, and they continue this precedence pattern. 成员集合中具有相等值呈现在可视化树中出现的顺序。Members of a collection that have equal values are rendered in the order in which they appear in the visual tree. 您可以通过循环访问的成员确定子级的索引位置集合。You can determine the index position of a child by iterating the members of the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示在代码中如何设置的值属性 (通过使用方法)。The following example demonstrates in code how to set the value of the property (by using the method). [!code-cpp[canvasz-order#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/CPP/CanvasZ-Order.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[canvasz-order#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/Csharp/CanvasZ-Order.cs#2)] [!code-vb[canvasz-order#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/VisualBasic/CanvasZ-Order.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更高版本`value`的给定`element`，越有可能`element`将在前台显示。The greater the `value` of a given `element`, the more likely the `element` is to appear in the foreground. 同样，如果`element`具有相对较低`value`，则`element`可能会在后台中。Likewise, if an `element` has a relatively low `value`, the `element` will likely appear in the background. 例如， `element` ，其`value`上方将显示为 5`element`具有`value`4，又将出现在上面的`element`值为 3，依此类推。For example, an `element` that has a `value` of 5 will appear above an `element` that has a `value` of 4, which in turn will appear above an `element` that has a value of 3, and so on. 允许使用负值，并将不断此优先顺序模式。Negative values are allowed, and they continue this precedence pattern. 成员集合中具有相等值呈现在可视化树中出现的顺序。Members of a collection that have equal values are rendered in the order in which they appear in the visual tree. 您可以通过循环访问的成员确定子级的索引位置集合。You can determine the index position of a child by iterating the members of the collection. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的值属性使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和代码。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-cpp[canvasz-order#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/CPP/CanvasZ-Order.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[canvasz-order#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/Csharp/CanvasZ-Order.cs#1)] [!code-xml[canvasz-order#1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/XAML/default.xaml#1)]
